scripts.clean: npx shx rm -fr ./dist && npx shx rm -fr tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.dev: npm run copy:worker:OBJLoader2Worker && npm run build:worker:HelloWorldWorker && npx vite --debug
scripts.doc: echo 'docs are not generated for examples'
scripts.build:worker:HelloWorldWorker: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/HelloWorldWorker*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.HelloWorldWorker.ts build
scripts.build:worker:HelloWorldThreeWorker: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/HelloWorldThreeWorker*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.HelloWorldThreeWorker.ts build
scripts.build:worker:InfiniteWorkerExternalGeome: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/InfiniteWorkerExternalGeometry*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.InfiniteWorkerExternalGeometry.ts build
scripts.build:worker:InfiniteWorkerInternalGeome: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/InfiniteWorkerInternalGeometry*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.InfiniteWorkerInternalGeometry.ts build
scripts.build:worker:OBJLoaderWorker: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/OBJLoaderWorker*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.OBJLoaderWorker.ts build
scripts.build:worker:OBJLoader2Worker: npm run copy:worker:OBJLoader2Worker && npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/OBJLoader2Worker*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.OBJLoader2Worker.ts build
scripts.build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest1: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/TransferableWorkerTest1*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.TransferableWorkerTest1.ts build
scripts.build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest2: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/TransferableWorkerTest2*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.TransferableWorkerTest2.ts build
scripts.build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest3: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/TransferableWorkerTest3*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.TransferableWorkerTest3.ts build
scripts.build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest4: npx shx rm -f ./src/worker/generated/TransferableWorkerTest4*.js && npx vite -c build/vite.config.TransferableWorkerTest4.ts build
scripts.build:worker: npm run build:worker:prepare && npm run build:worker:HelloWorldWorker && npm run build:worker:HelloWorldThreeWorker && npm run build:worker:InfiniteWorkerExternalGeometry && npm run build:worker:InfiniteWorkerInternalGeometry && npm run build:worker:OBJLoaderWorker && npm run build:worker:OBJLoader2Worker && npm run build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest1 && npm run build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest2 && npm run build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest3 && npm run build:worker:TransferableWorkerTest4
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:worker:OBJLoader2Worker && npm run compile
scripts.copy:assets:production: npx shx mkdir -p ./preview/worker/generated && npx shx cp -f ./src/worker/generated/*.js ./preview/worker/generated && npx shx cp -f ./models/obj/female02/*.jpg ./preview/assets
scripts.build:production: npm run build && npx vite build --debug && npm run build:worker && npm run copy:assets:production
scripts.preview:production: npx vite build --debug && npm run copy:assets:production && http-server ./preview
